lines.text: Seems there's been a young riot down to Sadie's place.
That so? Any of the girls hurt?
A couple. Sadie too. She came in looking like a hamburger.
Doctor, you're wanted in the emergency room.
I'll be right there...

[In the emergency room, Nurse Hammond dabs at Madame Sadie's blackened eye with an alcohol swab]
Whaddya wanna do? Put my eye out?
Sorry. Seems as if somebody already beat me to it.
Yes, wait'll I lay my hands on him the big... begonia. Oh, isn't that doctor ever coming?
Dr. Connolly'll be right up. We're pretty busy here tonight.
Lotta customers, eh? You must put on a good show.
I've never heard any applause.

[Dr. Connolly enters]
I'm sorry to have kept you waiting.
Why Mr. Gregory! Fancy meeting you here!
[Nurse Hammond furrows her brow disapprovingly at the doctor]

[nervously]
Why... I'm afraid you must be mistaken madam. I'm Dr. Connolly.
Oh, uh, ok Doc. Never saw ya before.
I wanted to see you about Miss Benton. I want her for my nurse.
Everyone does. She's one of our best nurses.
Oh, I'll pay extra.
I think it can be arranged. I wish we had more like her. They're very hard to find.
It's a problem, isn't it, getting good girls? I have the same trouble over at my place.
Oh yes, Miss Benton told me. You have sort of a... a beauty parlor?
Yeah, I guess you *could* call it that.
I see.
Ya know, your best girls are always leaving ya, setting up in business for themselves. Sometimes right across the street.
Oh, that's very difficult! But then the help question always is.
You've said it!
I hope your shop will function alright until you return.
Oh, it'll get along alright. It's one of those businesses that just runs itself. You know, it just rolls on and on and on.
They won't put much over on her.
That sounds like experience talking.
That young lady knows all the answers.
I take it you haven't got to first base.
First base? I'm still at the plate and the pitching it brutal.
Well, perhaps she doesn't like being just one of the crowd.
Well, you know me...
Jerry, I think I'll have another one of those pink suspenders.
Me too!
Alright., then.
[Pours a cocktail]
How wold you care for a bosom caresser?
A what?
They call it that because it warms you all the way down.
Well, why not!
You sure is got a grand figure, madame. Where you is inflated and deflated in the right places.
